formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Math' =-
[Synopsis] Performs Mathematical Functions
[Description] Math(returnvar,<number1><op><number 2>
Perform floating point calculation on number 1 to number 2 and store the result in returnvar. Valid ops are: +,-,/,*,%%%%,<,>,>=,<=,== and behave as their C equivalents. This application has been deprecated in favor of the MATH function.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
